definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
cabin/the hold of a ship or airplane

sentences.english: Try to get a window seat near the front of the plane when flying.
sentences.chinese: 乘坐飛機時，爭取在飛機前艙找一個靠窗的座位。

sentences.english: The front cabin of the train transforms into the robot, with the smoke stack turn into his hand gun.
sentences.chinese: 火車的前艙變成機器人，與煙霧堆棧槍把他的手打開。
